translations: 治安委员会成员；自发组织的治安维持者（vigilante 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The vigilantes dragged the men out.
sentences.translation: 联防队员们把那些男子拖了出来。

sentences.sentence: The vigilantes dragged the men out of the vehicles.
sentences.translation: 治安联防员将这些人从车里拽了出来。

sentences.sentence: One possibility is that the “bond-market vigilantes” have been asleep.
sentences.translation: 第一种解释是“债券市场警戒员”睡着了。 “有时我们怀疑美国国库券投资者是不是喜欢赔钱。”
